name: The Darkness (itch) (FishStudios)
description:
The Darkness is a survival horror game where every step you take can  lead you to survive or die one wrong move and you will die.He stalks you with is red eyes you are his prey and he will hunt you. Are you afraid of the dark?

Move-Arrow keys 

FishStudios
